remixlab.proscene

Class MathUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • remixlab.proscene.MathUtils

  • public class MathUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class that complements the PVector and PMatrix classes.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MathUtils() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static float[] from4x4MatrixToArray(float[][] mat)
      Utility function that returns the [16] float array version of the given mat matrix.
      static processing.core.PMatrix3D fromArray(float[] a)
      Utility function that returns the PMatrix3D representation of the 16 array given in European format.
      static float[][] fromArrayTo4x4Matrix(float[] m)
      Utility function that returns the [4][4] float matrix version of the given m array.
      static processing.core.PMatrix3D fromMatrix(float[][] m)
      Utility function that returns the PMatrix3D representation of the 4x4 m given in European format.
      static processing.core.PMatrix3D fromOpenGLArray(float[] array)
      Utility function that returns the PMatrix3D representation of the 16 array given in OpenGL format.
      static processing.core.PMatrix3D fromOpenGLMatrix(float[][] matrix)
      Utility function that returns the PMatrix3D representation of the 4x4 matrix given in OpenGL format.
      static float[][] get3x3UpperLeftMatrixFromPMatrix3D(processing.core.PMatrix3D pM)
      Utility function that returns the 3x3 upper left sub-matrix of the given PMatrix3D.
      static processing.core.PVector orthogonalVector(processing.core.PVector v)
      Utility function that returns a PVector orthogonal to v.
      static processing.core.PVector projectVectorOnAxis(processing.core.PVector src, processing.core.PVector direction)
      Utility function that simply projects src on the axis of direction direction that passes through the origin.
      static processing.core.PVector projectVectorOnPlane(processing.core.PVector src, processing.core.PVector normal)
      Utility function that simply projects src on the plane whose normal is normal that passes through the origin.

      Utility function that returns the squared norm of the PVector.

      Utility function that returns the [4][4]float matrix representation (European format) of the given PMatrix3D.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MathUtils

        public MathUtils()

    • Method Detail

      • projectVectorOnAxis

        public static processing.core.PVector projectVectorOnAxis(processing.core.PVector src,
                                          processing.core.PVector direction)
        Utility function that simply projects src on the axis of direction direction that passes through the origin.

        direction does not need to be normalized (but must be non null).

      • projectVectorOnPlane

        public static processing.core.PVector projectVectorOnPlane(processing.core.PVector src,
                                           processing.core.PVector normal)
        Utility function that simply projects src on the plane whose normal is normal that passes through the origin.

        normal does not need to be normalized (but must be non null).

      • squaredNorm

        public static float squaredNorm(processing.core.PVector v)
        Utility function that returns the squared norm of the PVector.

      • orthogonalVector

        public static processing.core.PVector orthogonalVector(processing.core.PVector v)
        Utility function that returns a PVector orthogonal to v. Its mag() depends on the PVector, but is zero only for a null PVector. Note that the function that associates an orthogonalVector() to a PVector is not continuous.

      • fromMatrix

        public static final processing.core.PMatrix3D fromMatrix(float[][] m)
        Utility function that returns the PMatrix3D representation of the 4x4 m given in European format.

      • fromOpenGLMatrix

        public static final processing.core.PMatrix3D fromOpenGLMatrix(float[][] matrix)
        Utility function that returns the PMatrix3D representation of the 4x4 matrix given in OpenGL format.

      • fromArray

        public static final processing.core.PMatrix3D fromArray(float[] a)
        Utility function that returns the PMatrix3D representation of the 16 array given in European format.

      • fromOpenGLArray

        public static final processing.core.PMatrix3D fromOpenGLArray(float[] array)
        Utility function that returns the PMatrix3D representation of the 16 array given in OpenGL format.

      • toMatrix

        public static final float[][] toMatrix(processing.core.PMatrix3D pM)
        Utility function that returns the [4][4]float matrix representation (European format) of the given PMatrix3D.

      • toOpenGLArray

        public static final float[] toOpenGLArray(processing.core.PMatrix3D pM)
        Utility function that returns the [16]array representation (OpenGL format) of the given PMatrix3D.

      • toOpenGLMatrix

        public static final float[][] toOpenGLMatrix(processing.core.PMatrix3D pM)
        Utility function that returns the [4][4]float matrix representation (OpenGL format) of the given PMatrix3D.

      • transpose3x3Matrix

        public static final float[][] transpose3x3Matrix(float[][] m)
        Utility function that returns the transpose of the given 3X3 matrix.

      • transpose4x4Matrix

        public static final float[][] transpose4x4Matrix(float[][] m)
        Utility function that returns the transpose of the given 4X4 matrix.

      • fromArrayTo4x4Matrix

        public static final float[][] fromArrayTo4x4Matrix(float[] m)
        Utility function that returns the [4][4] float matrix version of the given m array.

      • from4x4MatrixToArray

        public static final float[] from4x4MatrixToArray(float[][] mat)
        Utility function that returns the [16] float array version of the given mat matrix.

        Utility function that returns the 3x3 upper left sub-matrix of the given PMatrix3D.
